name: Dawn Survivor
description:
Zombie Apocalypse is here! Can you survive and escape?

Dawn Survivor is a point and click horror adventure game inspired by classic zombie films. 

Explore a ruined city, collect useful items and use them to escape from this zombie outbreak nightmare.

Features:

  • Our beloved horror villain of all time: ZOMBIES!
  • Classic jump scares.
  • Low budget, high entertainment.
  • No deep philosophical story that mess up your mind and sanity.

Controls:

This game can be played with a mouse. Left click to walk, pick up items, or examine objects in a scene. Double click to run.

Right click on an item in the inventory to examine it.

Note:

This is a short game created  for  Themed Horror Game Jam #3  using Unity.

Enjoy (or hate) this game? Give it a rating or leave a comment!

Found any bugs? Please report it!

Donations are appreciated!

Check out my other game jam games: Silent City.
